reviewText: I'm a big fan of Jordi Schell... and he didn't disappoint me... great turorial
Their dvds often have problems. Every dvd freezes.

Video was great. Very good instructions and tips to help get started.

*Edited since original post:

Thought I had originally received a faulty disc.  Appears to just have compatibility issues with bluray players and may need to be played in an older or regular dvd player.
